h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: As you head back to the shrine before the next big boss fight, now is a good time to take stock on what you've gained thus far.
promot:

The content is as follows:
As you head back to the shrine before the next big boss fight, now is a good time to take stock on what you've gained thus far.
